<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 20"
    pfs=""
>
[The Cyclone](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2503)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 73</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Cyclone_ represents tumultuous evil plots. As long as it is invested, _The Cyclone_ bolsters you with helpful winds that grant you a +2 item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks made to [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36), [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37), and [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41). This increases to a +3 item bonus if you are at least 17th level.

<document level="2" id="action-2049" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: The Cyclone
